item.description:
From Emily:

"I found a place in Derry: 48 South Ave, #2

I expect to arrive Saturday, June 19, but since I'm driving a truck
in from Seattle, I'm just going to decompress for a night.

I'll be unloading Sunday, starting around 1 p.m., more or less.

...

Food and drink will be provided.

My phone number: (603) 845-3228 (VILE-CAT). I'll have email and
Facebook until Tuesday morning, but then not again until Monday, June
21 (according to Fairpoint)."
item.name: Moving Help for Member Emily Sandblade
